instruction: Create an email requesting a meeting with a professor.
output:
Dear Professor [Insert Name],

I am [Insert Name], a student in your [Insert Course/Subject] class and I am writing to request a meeting with you to discuss a project I am working on. I believe our conversation could be helpful for me to gain a better understanding of the subject matter. I am available at your convenience and look forward to hearing from you.

Sincerely, 
[Insert Name]
